skill.name: DEATH_MATCH
Death Match
skill.description: Power is higher the lower the user's current HP is.

skill.name: PERFECT_AIM
Perfect Aim
skill.description: Defeats the foe if it hits, regardless of their HP.

skill.name: RECOMPENSATE
Recompensate
skill.description: Lowers the foe's HP to be the same as the user's HP.

skill.name: WHOLE_BEING
Whole Being
skill.description: Bypasses half of the foe's FoDef, but the user faints.

skill.name: FINAL_TRIBULATION
Final Tribulation
skill.description: Bypasses half of the foe's FoDef, but the user faints. Is more powerful for Void-types.

skill.name: LAST_RESORT
Last Resort
skill.description: Can only be used when all other skills have been used once.

skill.name: FIRM_SPIRIT
Firm Spirit
skill.description: A two-turn skill. On the first turn, the user's FoDef is raised.

skill.name: OVERSKILL
Overskill
skill.description: The user takes 1/3 of the damage in recoil.

skill.name: SPIRIT_RUSH
Spirit Rush
skill.description: The user takes 1/4 of the damage in recoil.

skill.name: SWALLOW_CUT
Swallow Cut
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: BLOW_FROM_CALAMITY
Blow from Calamity
skill.description: Power doubles if the user has a status ailment. Ignores the penalty from Dark status.

skill.name: RETALIATION
Retaliation
skill.description: Power doubles if an ally was defeated last turn.

skill.name: RAID
Raid
skill.description: Will always make the foe flinch, but can only be used on entering combat.

skill.name: TIGER_RUSH
Tiger Rush
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: SHADOW_RUSH
Shadow Rush
skill.description: Bypasses Supernatural Border and Thorned Ivy, and has increased priority.

skill.name: DANMAKU_DANCE
Danmaku Dance
skill.description: The user attacks for 2-3 turns, then becomes confused.

skill.name: TRI-EFFECT
Tri-Effect
skill.description: 20% chance to paralyze, blind, or scare the foe.

skill.name: DESTRUCTION
Destruction
skill.description: 30% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: HEAVENLY_BLESSING
Heavenly Blessing
skill.description: During weather, power doubles and the type changes.

skill.name: EARTHLY_BLESSING
Earthly Blessing
skill.description: During terrain, power doubles and the type changes.

skill.name: FALSE_COURAGE
False Courage
skill.description: Attempts to survive the next attack with 1 HP. May fail if used consecutively.

skill.name: SUPERNATURAL_BORDER
Supernatural Border
skill.description: Blocks all damage from the foe's attack. May fail if used consecutively.

skill.name: MAGIC_BARRIER
Magic Barrier
skill.description: Puts up a barrier using a fourth of the user's max HP.

skill.name: INVOKE_DEITY
Invoke Deity
skill.description: Sharply raises one of the user's stats randomly.

skill.name: FIRST_AID
First Aid
skill.description: Restores half of the user's HP.

skill.name: POWER_SPOT
Power Spot
skill.description: At the end of the next turn, the current puppet regains half of the user's max HP.

skill.name: UNCONSCIOUS_MIND
Unconscious Mind
skill.description: Can only be used while stopped. Randomly uses another skill.

skill.name: INNER_POWER
Inner Power
skill.description: Sacrifices half of the user's HP to maximize FoAtk.

skill.name: IMPOSING_AIR
Imposing Air
skill.description: Raises the user's FoAtk and Speed.

skill.name: OFFENSIVE_TRANCE
Offensive Trance
skill.description: Sharply raises the user's FoAtk, SpAtk, and Speed at the cost of FDef and SDef.

skill.name: BATTLE_PREPARATION
Battle Preparation
skill.description: Raises the user's FoAtk, FoDef, and Accuracy.

skill.name: FORESEE
Foresee
skill.description: Attempts to use the attacking skill the foe will use, with 50% more power.

skill.name: BACKUP_PLAN
Backup Plan
skill.description: Switches to another puppet. That puppet inherits the user's stat modifiers.

skill.name: GUIDED_MISSILE
Guided Missile
skill.description: 10% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: SCATTER_BEAM
Scatter Beam
skill.description: A normal attack that lands critical hits often.

skill.name: GOOD_LUCK
Good Luck
skill.description: Raises one of the user's stats randomly.

skill.name: FOCUSED_MOVEMENT
Focused Movement
skill.description: Raises the user's FoAtk and FoDef at the cost of Speed.

skill.name: ETERNAL_RECORD
Eternal Record
skill.description: Replicates Field Barrier, Field Protect, and Lucky Rainbow, but the user faints.

skill.name: RECOLLECTION
Recollection
skill.description: Copies all of the foe's attributes.

skill.name: HEAVENLY_INFLUENCE
Heavenly Influence
skill.description: During weather, power doubles and the type changes.

skill.name: EARTHLY_INFLUENCE
Earthly Influence
skill.description: During terrain, power doubles and the type changes.

skill.name: CONFLAGRATION
Conflagration
skill.description: Power is higher if the user's Cost is higher than the foe's.

skill.name: PURGATORY_FLICKER
Purgatory Flicker
skill.description: The user takes 1/3 of the damage in recoil. 10% chance to burn the foe.

skill.name: BURN_STRIKE
Burn Strike
skill.description: 10% chance to burn the foe. Lands critical hits more often.

skill.name: PHOENIX_WALTZ
Phoenix Waltz
skill.description: Power decreases if the user is not at full HP.

skill.name: DEFLAGRATION
Deflagration
skill.description: The user cannot move next turn.

skill.name: FLAME_WAVE
Flame Wave
skill.description: 50% chance to raise the user's SpAtk.

skill.name: FIRE_WALL
Fire Wall
skill.description: If the foe holds an item, the attack is 50% stronger and destroys the item.

skill.name: TERRAIN_[SUZAKU]
Terrain [Suzaku]
skill.description: Changes the terrain to Suzaku for 5 turns. During Suzaku, healing effects cause harm.

skill.name: FIRE_SIGN
Fire Sign
skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: FLASH_FLOOD
Flash Flood
skill.description: A normal attack that lands critical hits often.

skill.name: ICE_COFFIN
Ice Coffin
skill.description: 20% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: AQUA_JAVELIN
Aqua Javelin
skill.description: 20% chance to lower the foe's Speed.

skill.name: REVERSE_SPLASH
Reverse Splash
skill.description: Power doubles if the foe attacks the user on the same turn.

skill.name: AQUASONIC
Aquasonic
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: AQUA_CUTTER
Aqua Cutter
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: AQUA_CANNON
Aqua Cannon
skill.description: Power decreases if the user is not at full HP.

skill.name: AQUA_RAKE
Aqua Rake
skill.description: The user cannot move next turn.

skill.name: ICE_AGE
Ice Age
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's Speed.

skill.name: GEYSER
Geyser
skill.description: A normal attack that always lands critical hits.

skill.name: VEIL_OF_WATER
Veil of Water
skill.description: For 5 turns, the user's side cannot have their stats lowered by the foe's side.

skill.name: CLOUDBURST
Cloudburst
skill.description: Raises the user's FoAtk and FoDef at the cost of Speed.

skill.name: AQUATIC_WALTZ
Aquatic Waltz
skill.description: Changes the foe's type to Water.

skill.name: TERRAIN_[GENBU]
Terrain [Genbu]
skill.description: Changes the terrain to Genbu for 5 turns. During Genbu, slower puppets move first.

skill.name: SNOWBALL_FIGHT
Snowball Fight
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's Speed.

skill.name: WATER_SIGN
Water Sign
skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: TUMBLE_PLANT
Tumble Plant
skill.description: Power is higher if the foe's cost is high.

skill.name: PEACH-THORN_ARROW
Peach-Thorn Arrow
skill.description: The user takes 1/3 of the damage in recoil.

skill.name: NATURAL_BEAUTY
Natural Beauty
skill.description: 20% chance to lower the foe's FoAtk.

skill.name: POWER_DRAIN
Power Drain
skill.description: The user recovers half of the damage dealt.

skill.name: PETAL_DANCE
Petal Dance
skill.description: The user attacks for 2-3 turns, then becomes confused.

skill.name: RAINBOW_FLOWERS
Rainbow Flowers
skill.description: A two-turn skill. The user charges on the first turn. Works instantly during Aurora.

skill.name: POLLEN_MIST
Pollen Mist
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's SpAtk.

skill.name: ENERGY_ABSORB
Energy Absorb
skill.description: The user recovers half of the damage dealt.

skill.name: FOREST_THERAPY
Forest Therapy
skill.description: Heals the user's party of all status ailments.

skill.name: FOUNTAIN_OF_LIFE
Fountain of Life
skill.description: The user recovers a little HP every turn, but becomes unable to switch or be blown away.

skill.name: THORNED_IVY
Thorned Ivy
skill.description: Blocks all damage from the foe's attack and counters strong attacks. May fail if used consecutively.

skill.name: DRAIN_SEED
Drain Seed
skill.description: The foe's HP is drained to the user's side every turn. Does not work on Nature-type puppets.

skill.name: GRACE_OF_MANA
Grace of Mana
skill.description: Restores half of the user's HP.

skill.name: WHITE_LILY_DANCE
White Lily Dance
skill.description: The user faints. The next puppet to come out is restored to full HP and normal status.

skill.name: FAIRY_DANCE
Fairy Dance
skill.description: Raises the user's SpAtk, SpDef, and Speed.

skill.name: BEWITCHING_POLLEN
Bewitching Pollen
skill.description: Stops the foe. Does not work on Nature-type puppets.

skill.name: TERRAIN_[SEIRYU]
Terrain [Seiryu]
skill.description: Changes the terrain to Seiryu for 5 turns. During Seiryu, types do not interact.

skill.name: BUTTERFLYS_FLIT
Butterfly's Flit
skill.description: The user recovers a little HP every turn.

skill.name: PARASITE
Parasite
skill.description: The user recovers half of the damage dealt.

skill.name: APPLE_BOMB
Apple Bomb
skill.description: A normal attack that lands critical hits often.

skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's Sp.Atk.

skill.name: NATURE_SIGN

skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: UNSTABLE_HORIZON

skill.name: LANDSLIDE
Landslide
skill.description: Power doubles if the foe has less than half of their HP.

skill.name: STONE_CIRCLE
Stone Circle
skill.description: 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats.

skill.name: MINE_TRAP
Mine Trap
skill.description: Lays a trap that hurts foes entering the field. Can be set up to 3 times.

Weather [Duststorm]
skill.description: Changes the weather to Dust Storm for 5 turns. This harms puppets of most types.

Realm [Gold]
skill.description: Summons Dust Storm weather and Kohryu terrain.

skill.name: DESTRUCTION_RIFT

skill.description: Will double in power during any terrain, as well as cancel the terrain.

skill.name: CLEARING_MIST
Clearing Mist
skill.description: Power is higher if the foe's cost is high.

skill.name: MIRRORS_REFLECTION
Mirror's Reflection
skill.description: Damage is 50% more than the damage taken from the foe's attack on the same turn.

skill.name: IMPACT_REBELLION
Impact Rebellion
skill.description: Power is proportional to the foe's Speed, and inversely proportional to the user's Speed.

skill.name: FULL_METAL_CRASH
Full Metal Crash
skill.description: The user takes half of the damage in recoil.

skill.name: SAMURAI_EDGE
Samurai Edge
skill.description: 10% chance to raise the user's FoAtk.

skill.name: BRANDISH
Brandish
skill.description: The user takes 1/3 of the damage in recoil.

skill.name: ARMOR_PIERCE
Armor Pierce
skill.description: 10% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: KILLING_BITE

skill.description: A normal attack that always lands critical hits.

skill.name: OVERTAKE_STRIKE
Overtake Strike
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: LAST_SLASH

skill.name: SILVER_RAIN
Silver Rain
skill.description: 10% chance to raise the user's SpAtk.

skill.name: CHROME_RAY
Chrome Ray
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's SpDef.

skill.name: FOCUSED_STANCE
Focused Stance

skill.name: MAD_RUSH_STANCE
Mad Rush Stance

skill.name: VIGILANT_WATCH

skill.description: 10% chance to make the foe flinch.

Air Stamp

skill.name: THIEVING_WIND
Thieving Wind

skill.name: SWIFT_AIR-RAID

skill.name: WIND_WAVE

Dancing Wind

skill.name: UNFETTERED_SOUL
Unfettered Soul
skill.description: Does double damage if the user is not holding an item.

skill.name: SHADOW_BOMB
Shadow Bomb
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: CHARON_FERRIES
Charon Ferries
skill.description: Damage is equal to the user's level.

skill.name: LOVE_OR_PAIN
Love or Pain
skill.description: Does double damage if the foe has a status ailment.

skill.name: SOUL_EATER
Soul Eater
skill.description: 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats.

skill.name: CALL_OF_THE_DEAD
Call of the Dead
skill.description: If the user faints due to a Skill before their next action, the foe also faints.

skill.name: CURSE_REVERSAL
Curse Reversal
skill.description: Adds the user's and foe's current HP and sets both to half of that.

skill.name: SHINIGAMIS_WALTZ
Shinigami's Waltz
skill.description: Consumes half of the user's HP to sap a fourth of the foe's HP every turn.

skill.name: JINX
Jinx
skill.description: Seals the skill the foe last used for four turns.

skill.name: SCORN
Scorn
skill.description: The last skill the foe used loses 4 SP.

skill.name: GHOST_TRICK
Ghost Trick
skill.description: 10% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: SPECTER_WARNING
Specter Warning
skill.description: 10% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: NETHER_SIGN
Nether Sign
skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: GHOST_CHASE
Ghost Chase
skill.description: Makes the user immune to Fighting-type skills.

skill.name: CROSS_COUNTER
Cross Counter
skill.description: Damage is twice the damage taken from the foe's Focus attack on the same turn.

skill.name: MOUNTAIN_BREAKER
Mountain Breaker
skill.description: Power is higher if the foe's cost is high.

skill.name: AIKIDO_ARTS
Aikido Arts
skill.description: Damage is equal to the user's level.

skill.name: DIRE_STATE
Dire State
skill.description: Power is higher the lower the user's current HP is.

skill.name: VACUUM_RUPTURE
Vacuum Rupture
skill.description: The user cannot move next turn.

skill.name: METEOR_IMPACT
Meteor Impact
skill.description: Fails if the user is hurt on the same turn they try to use this Skill.

skill.name: RECKLESS_DIVE
Reckless Dive
skill.description: If the skill fails to inflict damage, the user loses half of their HP.

skill.name: HEAVENLY_ASCENT
Heavenly Ascent
skill.description: Lowers the user's FoDef and SpDef.

skill.name: DANCING_SWORD
Dancing Sword
skill.description: A normal attack that lands critical hits often.

skill.name: AURA_DRAIN
Aura Drain
skill.description: The user recovers half of the damage dealt.

skill.name: BREAK_SHOT
Break Shot
skill.description: Breaks the foe's Field Barrier and Field Protect effects before doing damage.

skill.name: DILIGENCE
Diligence
skill.description: Power doubles if you take damage from a foe's Skill on the same turn.

skill.name: CHARGING_STUN
Charging Stun
skill.description: Forces the foe to switch out for a random puppet after doing damage. Ends battles against wild puppets.

skill.name: CORKSCREW
Corkscrew
skill.description: 70% chance to raise the user's FoAtk.

skill.name: STRIKE_SHOT
Strike Shot
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: DIVINE_PUNISHMENT
Divine Punishment
skill.description: The user faints to deal damage equal to the current HP.

skill.name: GIGANTIC
GIGANTIC
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's SpDef.

skill.name: CONCUSSION
Concussion
skill.description: 20% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: HACHIMANS_BLESSING
Hachiman's Blessing
skill.description: Greatly increases the chance that the user will land a critical hit.

skill.name: FORWARD_THRUST
Forward Thrust
skill.description: A normal attack that lands critical hits often.

skill.name: SPIRAL_STRIKE
Spiral Strike
skill.description: 10% chance to raise the user's SpAtk.

skill.name: FIGHTING_SIGN
Fighting Sign
skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: MIRACLE_REPRISAL
Miracle Reprisal
skill.description: Power increases the more the foe's stats have been increased.

skill.name: REVOLVING_ILLUSIONS
Revolving Illusions
skill.description: Uses the foe's FoAtk instead of the user's.

skill.name: EPHEMERAL
Ephemeral
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's FoDef.

skill.name: SNEAK_ATTACK
Sneak Attack
skill.description: Fails if the foe is not readying an attacking Skill, or if the foe moves first.

skill.name: MIRAGE_EDGE
Mirage Edge
skill.description: A normal attack that lands critical hits often.

skill.name: FLOWER_OF_HELL
Flower of Hell
skill.description: 30% chance to break the foe's stance, preventing them from avoiding the next attack.

skill.name: ST._ELMOS_FIRE
St. Elmo's Fire
skill.description: If the foe holds an item, the attack is 50% stronger and destroys the item.

skill.name: FAKE_JEWEL
Fake Jewel
skill.description: ""I'm just borrowin' it 'till I'm dead."" Steals foe's held item.

skill.name: PURSUIT
Pursuit
skill.description: If the foe attempts to switch on the same turn, attacks the fleeing puppet for double damage.

skill.name: GRAVITY_BLAST
Gravity Blast
skill.description: Power decreases if the foe is not at full HP.

skill.name: MOONS_REFLECTION
Moon's Reflection
skill.description: Damage is twice the damage taken from the foe's Spread attack on the same turn.

skill.name: CATASTROPHE
Catastrophe
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's SpDef.

skill.name: MYSTERIOUS_WAVE
Mysterious Wave
skill.description: Attacks against the foe's FoDef instead of their SpDef.

skill.name: CONTINUE
Continue
skill.description: The user recovers all HP and status, but is stopped for two turns.

skill.name: MIRAGE
Mirage
skill.description: Reflects Status skills back to the other party.

skill.name: NEAR-DEATH_EVENT
Near-Death Event
skill.description: Duplicates the effect of the last used Skill.

skill.name: AMNESIA
Amnesia
skill.description: The foe will be stopped at the end of the next turn.

skill.name: POWER_SWAP
Power Swap
skill.description: Switches the user's changes to FoAtk and SpAtk with the foe's.

skill.name: POWER_SPLIT
Power Split
skill.description: Averages the user's FoAtk and SpAtk with the foe's.

skill.name: CROSS_CHANGE
Cross Change
skill.description: Switches the user's Ability with the foe's.

skill.name: GUARD_SWAP
Guard Swap
skill.description: Switches the user's changes to FoDef and SpDef with the foe's.

skill.name: GUARD_SPLIT
Guard Split
skill.description: Averages the user's FoDef and SpDef with the foe's.

skill.name: PRETENSE
Pretense
skill.description: Changes the user's type to the type of the first Skill they know.

skill.name: DOPPELGANGER
Doppelganger
skill.description: Changes the user's type to the foe's type.

skill.name: IMAGINATION
Imagination
skill.description: Switches the user's FoAtk and FoDef.

skill.name: HONEST_MANS_LIE
Honest Man's Lie
skill.description: Moves the user's status ailment to the foe.

skill.name: POSSESSION
Possession
skill.description: Changes the user's Ability to the foe's Ability.

skill.name: PROJECTION
Projection
skill.description: The user copies all of the foe's stat modifiers.

skill.name: RECALL_NIGHTMARE
Recall Nightmare
skill.description: Changes the foe's Ability to Active, removing their old ability and preventing them from being Stopped.

skill.name: MIND_CONTROL
Mind Control
skill.description: Changes the foe's Ability to the user's Ability.

skill.name: MIRROR_WORLD
Mirror World
skill.description: 30% chance to make the foe flinch.

skill.name: IMAGINARY_FRIEND
Imaginary Friend
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's SpDef.

skill.name: ILLUSION_SIGN
Illusion Sign
skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: WORD_BREAK
Word Break
skill.description: Seals two of the foe's skills for four turns.

skill.name: DETONATION_BURST
Detonation Burst
skill.description: Lowers the user's FoAtk and FoDef.

skill.name: HIGH_TONE_CRUSH
High Tone Crush
skill.description: 10% chance to lower one of the foe's stats randomly.

skill.name: DANCING_RAIN
Dancing Rain
skill.description: 50% chance to lower the foe's FoDef.

skill.name: ULTRA_HIGH_TONE
Ultra High Tone
skill.description: 10% chance to raise one of the user's stats randomly.

skill.name: PRIMAL_NOISE
Primal Noise
skill.description: 50% chance to lower the foe's SpDef.

skill.name: INFINITE_SCALES
Infinite Scales
skill.description: Power increases the more the user's stats have been increased.

skill.name: ENCOURAGE
Encourage
skill.description: Forces the foe to keep using the Skill they last used for three turns.

skill.name: UPBEAT
Upbeat
skill.description: Prevents the foe from using Status Skills for three turns.

skill.name: BOOING
Booing
skill.description: Forces the foe to switch out for a random puppet. Ends battles against wild puppets.

skill.name: RUINOUS_VOICE
Ruinous Voice
skill.description: Both puppets will faint in 3 turns. Switching out ends the effect.

skill.name: MERRY_DANCE
Merry Dance
skill.description: Raises the user's FoDef and SpDef.

skill.name: DECRESCENDO
Decrescendo
skill.description: Lowers the foe's FoAtk and SpAtk. The user then switches for another puppet. Ends battles against wild puppets.

skill.name: CLAIM
Claim
skill.description: Prevents the foe from using the same Skill twice in a row.

skill.name: AMBIENT
Ambient
skill.description: 10% chance to lower one of the foe's stats randomly.

skill.name: WALTZ
Waltz
skill.description: 10% chance to raise one of the user's stats randomly.

skill.name: SOUND_SIGN
Sound Sign
skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: DISTORTION_BOMB
Distortion Bomb
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's FoDef.

skill.name: ALLURING_MAZE
Alluring Maze
skill.description: Attacks against the foe's SpDef instead of their FoDef.

skill.name: STEALTH_KILL
Stealth Kill
skill.description: Always hits. Bypasses the effects of Magical Barrier.

skill.name: TRICKSTER
Trickster
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: DENSE_FOG_BLOOM
Dense Fog Bloom
skill.description: A two-turn skill. The user charges on the first turn. Works instantly during Heavy Fog.

skill.name: IMPULSE
Impulse
skill.description: 10% chance to lower the foe's SpDef.

skill.name: LUSCIOUS_WHISPER
Luscious Whisper
skill.description: Attacks against the foe's FoDef instead of their SpDef.

skill.name: FIELD_BREAK
Field Break
skill.description: Breaks the foe's Field Barrier and Field Protect effects before doing damage.

skill.name: IRREVERSIBLE_TRICK
Irreversible Trick
skill.description: Ignores Field Protect and Barrier Option, will increase in power if foe uses a support skill.

skill.name: MIRROR_DAMAGE
Mirror Damage
skill.description: Power doubles if you take damage from a foe's Skill on the same turn.

skill.name: FORCE_SHIELD
Force Shield
skill.description: Removes your weaknesses and resistances this turn to greatly limit damage. May fail if used consecutively.

skill.name: ELEMENT_REVERSE
Element Reverse
skill.description: Inverts the foe's weaknesses and resistances.

skill.name: FIELD_SHIFT
Field Shift
skill.description: Moves the foe's Field Barrier, Field Protect, Lucky Rainbow, and Magical Barrier to your side.

skill.name: WEATHER_[SUNSHOWER]
Weather [Sunshower]
skill.description: Changes the weather to Sunshower for 5 turns. During Sunshower, FoDef and SpDef are switched.

skill.name: WARPED_SIGN
Warped Sign
skill.description: A normal attack. A puppet can only know one sign skill at a time.

skill.name: REALM_[BLACK_RAIN]
Realm [Black Rain]
skill.description: Summons Sunshower weather and Genbu terrain.

skill.name: SUPERNOVA
Supernova
skill.description: Shinki EX only. Causes two random status effects. Always hits.

skill.name: BLITZKRIEG
Blitzkrieg
skill.description: Power doubles if the user moves before the target or the target switches.

skill.name: TAKE_OVER
Take Over
skill.description: Uses the foe's SpAtk instead of the user's.

skill.name: OMEN
Omen
skill.description: Lowers the user's SpAtk and SpDef.

skill.name: FLASH
Flash
skill.description: A normal attack with increased priority.

skill.name: LAST_FAREWELL
Last Farewell
skill.description: Komachi EX only. Defeats the opponent if it hits.

skill.name: FANTASY_SEAL
Fantasy Seal
skill.description: Reimu EX only. Always hits. Strikes 2-5 times.

skill.name: SCORE_WEB
Score Web
skill.description: Benben EX only. If the foe holds an item, attack is 50% stronger and removes said item.

skill.name: ORRERIES_SUN
Orreries Sun
skill.description: Mima EX only. Increases all stats by 1 stage.

skill.name: SWALLOWTAIL_LANCE
Swallowtail Lance
skill.description: Yuyuko EX only. Heal 50% of the damage dealt.

skill.name: LAEVATEINN
Laevateinn
skill.description: Flandre EX only. Lowers SPAtk and SpDef after use.

skill.name: STUN_BOMB
Stun Bomb
skill.description: Yumemi EX only. Paralyzes the enemy. Strikes first.

skill.name: GODDESS_DECREE
Goddess' Decree
skill.description: Shinki EX only. Increases all stats by 1 stage.

skill.name: QUADRUPLE_BARRIER
Quadruple Barrier
skill.description: Yukari EX only. Increases FoDef after dealing damage. Always hits.

skill.name: BOMBARDMENT
Bombardment
skill.description: Yumemi EX only. Hits twice. Strikes first.

skill.name: BOUNDARY_REND
Boundary Rend
skill.description: Maribel EX only. Sets enemy HP to 1.

skill.name: SEASON_[WINTER]
Season [Winter]
skill.description: Replicates the effects of Genbu and Duststorm.

skill.name: SEASON_[SPRING]
Season [Spring]
skill.description: Replicates the effects of Seiryuu and Sunshower.

skill.name: SEASON_[SUMMER]
Season [Summer]
skill.description: Replicates the effects of Suzaku and Aurora.

skill.name: SEASON_[FALL]
Season [Fall]
skill.description: Replicates the effects of Byakko and Heavy Fog.

skill.name: SEASON_[DOYOU]
Season [Doyou]
skill.description: Replicates the effects of Kohryu and Calm.

skill.name: FADING_OUT
Fading Out
skill.description: The user switches for another puppet. Ends battles against wild puppets.

skill.name: BLADE_DANCE
Blade Dance
skill.description: Yumeko EX only. Replicates Smash Spin. Always hits.

skill.name: MASTER_SPARK
Master Spark
skill.description: Marisa EX only. Ignores the opponent's stat modifiers.

skill.name: RAINBOW_SLASH
Rainbow Slash
skill.description: Kogasa EX only. High flinch rate.

skill.name: ELECTRIC_HERITAGE
Electric Heritage
skill.description: Heals for half the damage dealt.

skill.name: ダミー
ダミー
skill.description: 気象を 濃霧 地相を 朱雀に する。
